column5: I thought this was pretty cool!    I'm thinking those bears are full.  :lol:
That IS pretty cool!! WOW  Sinker
Thats awesome, thanks for the link.

polar bears actually would only eat dogs like that when they are staving or mating.  you have to remember they hunt and kill 1000 pound walruses so a dog would be like a crumb to them.  bears have a playful side to them like all animals.  but i wouldnt trust them iwht my dogs anyway lol  cheers!
